name: Ovation Adults' Equestrian Horse Riding Lightweight Comfortable Adjustable Low-Profile Metallic Schooler Helmet
short_description: RUBBERIZED FINISH - The Ovation Metallic Schooler Helmet not only ensures protection but also presents a sleek and modern appearance with its rubberized finish. This coating not only enhances durability but also contributes to the helmet's stylish design

EASY ADJUST DIAL - Achieve the perfect fit effortlessly with the helmet's easy-adjust dial. This innovative feature allows riders to customize the fit, providing a snug and secure feel during every ride

EXTRA STRONG ADJUSTMENT TEETH - Built with durability in mind, the equestrian helmet is equipped with extra-strong adjustment teeth. This design element not only enhances the overall robustness of the helmet but also contributes to an extended lifespan
HIGH FLOW VENTS - Keep your cool, even during the most intense rides, thanks to the high-flow vents strategically integrated into the helmet's design

REMOVABLE FEATURES - The Ovation Metallic Schooler Helmet prioritizes convenience with its removable features. The washable liner ensures easy maintenance, allowing you to keep your helmet fresh and clean
product_description: Experience the perfect blend of style, comfort, and safety with the Ovation Metallic Schooler Helmet. This lightweight, low-profile helmet is not just a protective gear; it's a statement of modern equestrian sophistication. Elevate your look with the helmet's rubberized finish, a sleek coating that not only adds a touch of contemporary flair but also enhances durability for long-lasting performance. Achieve a customized fit effortlessly with the easy-adjust dial. Tailor the helmet to your comfort, ensuring a snug and secure feel every time you ride. Built for resilience, the helmet features extra-strong adjustment teeth. This design not only boosts the helmet's sturdiness but also extends its lifespan, making it a reliable companion for avid riders. Stay cool and focused with the high-flow vents strategically incorporated into the helmet. Enjoy optimal airflow, preventing discomfort from heat buildup during intense rides. Prioritize convenience with removable features. The washable liner ensures easy maintenance, while the removable breakaway visors add versatility, allowing you to personalize the helmet's appearance. The exclusive YKK adjuster clip and buckle, positioned for rider comfort, enhance the overall convenience of this ASTM standard-certified helmet. Choose the Ovation Metallic Schooler Helmet for a riding experience that seamlessly combines safety with contemporary elegance, setting you apart in the arena.

name: Land Helmets Stella Equestrian Helmet - ASTM/SEI F1163-23 & EN 1384 Certified Horse Riding Helmet - Lightweight, Comfortable & Stylish
short_description: Certified Safety You Can Trust: Meets CE EN1384:2023, CE EN VG1, and ASTM/SEI standards, providing certified impact protection recognized in the US and EU.
Low Profile & Lightweight Design: Sleek, aerodynamic shell maintains a refined silhouette while minimizing weight for all-day riding comfort.
Custom Comfort Fit: Adjustable dial-fit system and plush interior padding ensure a secure, personalized fit in both S/M (55–57 cm) and M/L (57–59 cm) sizes.
Stylish & Versatile Finishes: Choose from elegant options like Rose Gold, Glitter, Gloss Black & Carbon Fiber, or Blue & Silver Glitter to match your unique style.
Perfect For: Daily riding, schooling, show jumping, dressage, trail adventures, and competitions

name: Troxel Sport 2.0 Injection Molded Horse Riding Helmet, Lightweight Adjustable Design, Safety Horseback Riding Gear
short_description: 100% Matte
Imported

Equestrian Comfort Helmet: Troxel’s upgraded horseback riding helmet features a sturdy injection molded shell with an integrated visor for durability and precise fit; with a sports equestrian riding helmet, perform horse riding activities with ease

Improved Fit: This full coverage equestrian helmet is built to effortlessly adapt to a variety of head shapes; the adjustable horse helmet comes with a lightweight build that offers comfort and protection for tackling all your horse riding endeavors

Matte-Finish Accessory: Available in a wide range of solid colors, our matte equestrian helmets are designed to make a bold statement; ideal for matching your horse's gear or expressing your unique sense of style while riding

Maximum Ventilation: The seven large vents in this horse back riding helmet maximizes airflow keeping you cool and comfortable during long rides; also includes a removable washable headliner for easy effortless care and a fresh, breathable experience

Versatile Use: Recommended for riders of all types, our equestrian gear include sizes suitable for men, women and children; use this all-purpose horse riding equipment for your riding lessons, leisure riding, equestrian competitions and more
product_description: Troxel Horse Riding Helmet: Must-have equestrian gear for children and adults, competitive riders, equine enthusiasts, and a reliable accessory for riders of all experience levels. Our equestrian riding helmets provide superior performance and ease of use. Suitable to wear for daily rides, training sessions, events, racing, jumping, or equestrian sports. Designed for full coverage protection, this horse helmet offers incredible comfort and security. Unlike traditional riding helmets, our horse riding helmets for women, men, and children create the most comfortable fit for a variety of head shapes. Choose from a wide range of colors, styles, finish, and sizes for a personalized look and fit. It is a great option for riders looking to match their horse's gear or boldly show off their sense of style! Available in extra small, small, medium, large, and extra large sizes, ideal helmet gear for every rider. The sturdy material of this horse accessory can stand up to the rigors of equestrian activity and is designed for long-lasting use. Our horseback riding helmets are an ideal gift for horse showmen and equine owners alike.

name: OVATION Deluxe Schooler Helmet
short_description: Lightweight low-profile helmet from Ovation. Easy-care rubberized finish.
Features easy adjust dial for a snug fit, extra strong adjustment teeth for added helmet life.
High flow vents to keep you cool, removable washable liner, removable breakaway visors.
Exclusive YKK adjuster clip and buckle, positioned to stay off of the rider's face for comfort.
Ventilated to allow cooling airflow, this sleek riding helmet is suited to riders of all ages. 12+ years
product_description: OVATION DELUXE SCHOOLER HORSE RIDING HELMET The lightweight, low-profile Ovation Deluxe Schooler Helmet has an easy-adjust dial for a snug fit. It also features a rubberized finish, removable washable liner, removable breakaway visor, and exclusive YKK[R] adjuster clip and buckle designed to stay off the rider's face for comfort. Minimum manufacturer recommended age: 12+ years. OVATION RIDING HELMETS Ovation riding helmets come in styles for use in schooling or in the show ring. All our Ovation riding helmets are certified to ASTM or SEI ASTM standards. Riding helmets are not gender specific, but there lots of option both for men and women. Ovation riding helmets have low profiles, are lightweight, with many having features that allow for ventilation as well as sweat absorbtion. Because a good fit is important in a riding helmet, some of our Ovation riding helmets offer dial adjustment as well as harness adjuster clips. Many styles feature removable visors.
